text: Like the miner, the writer exploits every intuition like a quarry. He will often leave the hard work soon, since the vein is not deep. Other times it will yield rich deposits of the finest metal, the most refined gold. What a painful spectacle when we keep busy in a long-gone mantle! What a force for the thinker who does not greedily reach the last possible conclusion of his truth, sterilizing it; but who is pleased to show us that he is above all a string-discoverer and not a miserable barrier to the service of greedy shareholders! FIN
title: El descubridor
author: Julio Torri
